name: Skylines (David Estes-Smargiassi, Abby Welsh, Diana Voyer)
name_original: Skylines (David Estes-Smargiassi, Abby Welsh, Diana Voyer)
description:
Skylines is a minimal city-builder, where you slowly build up a city and enjoy the view. Keep your residents happy so your city keeps growing. Build the nicest skyline you can.

Click to select & place buildings. Right click to drag your view. Scroll to zoom. Hold space to hide UI.

Credits: Abby Welsh, Diana Voyer, David Estes-Smargiassi
